ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 24 May 1999, Saffy Lynn wrote:

> From: Saffy Lynn <saffy@...>
>
> on the Xegony server, it seems Greater Faydark is the only place where
> people auction shiny brass shields. a friend of mine came all the way from
> Qeynos when he heard they had them there. he paid 25 pp for his, but I
> believe 20 is more common. that is third on my list of things to buy, a
> combine sword being first. 50 pp takes awhile to save though.

The reaon that they are more common in Greater Fay is because to my
knowledge the only creature that carries the shield is the Orc Trainer
in Crushbone if you enter CB and hang a right you should find the trainer
hill. It's really IMHO the safest place in CB because of the amount of
people camping there trying to get the shield. Their is (from what I hear)
a 1 in 7 chance of getting the shield. it's almost worth buying it with the
amount of time you need to spend getting it... I was lucky I only had to
spend about 30min on that hill, there was a good group of people on the hill
that night and there was a "looting rotation" in effect i.e. no kill
stealers, my turn came up I killed the trainer and got a rusty battle ax,
rawhide tunic, and the shield which I use rather then selling, I was the
first person there all night who got a shield :)

--
